SEARCH
Package com.root14.barcodeservice.config

Class D2WriterProvider

java.lang.Object
com.root14.barcodeservice.config.D2WriterProvider
@Configuration public class D2WriterProvider extends Object
This class provides Spring Bean definitions for 2D barcode writers. It offers QRCodeWriter, DataMatrixWriter, AztecWriter, and PDF417Writer from the Google ZXing library as injectable components within a Spring application. Each writer bean is initialized lazily, meaning it will only be created when it is first needed.

  • Method Details

    • provideQRCodeWriter

      @Bean @Lazy public com.google.zxing.qrcode.QRCodeWriter provideQRCodeWriter()
      Provides an instance of QRCodeWriter. This writer is used for generating QR codes.
      Returns:
      A new instance of QRCodeWriter.
